body_html:
@juuh42dias I still can't run this PR locally, because the migrations fail.

== 20170731173902 AddColumnsIntoConferencePreferences: migrating ==============
-- add_column(:conference_preferences, :comment, :text)
   -> 0.0039s
-- f()
rails aborted!
StandardError: An error has occurred, this and all later migrations canceled:

undefined method `f' for #<AddColumnsIntoConferencePreferences:0x007f9cad4306d8>
/Users/mronacher/Development/rgsoc-teams/db/migrate/20170731173902_add_columns_into_conference_preferences.rb:4:in `up'
bin/rails:4:in `require'
bin/rails:4:in `<main>'
NoMethodError: undefined method `f' for #<AddColumnsIntoConferencePreferences:0x007f9cad4306d8>
/Users/mronacher/Development/rgsoc-teams/db/migrate/20170731173902_add_columns_into_conference_preferences.rb:4:in `up'
bin/rails:4:in `require'
bin/rails:4:in `<main>'
Tasks: TOP => db:migrate
(See full trace by running task with --trace)

Can anyone @carpodaster @klappradla please look into it? Maybe I'm going something wrong? I don't want the PR to be stuck because of me :/
